description:
Senior Fullstack Developer with over 7 years of experience, passionate about technology and innovation. I have a solid background in software development, with expertise in:

- JavaScript (Senior): Extensive experience with React, Angular, Next.js, Node.js, and NestJS for building both front-end and back-end applications.
- PHP (Senior): Skilled with Laravel, CodeIgniter, and Drupal, delivering robust and efficient solutions.
- Java (Mid-level): Proficient in backend development with Spring Boot, Quarkus, and JUnit.
- Python (Junior) and C# (Junior): Practical experience in specific projects, including .NET Core, Entity Framework, and Web API.
I have worked on complex projects utilizing micro front-ends (MFE) and microservices architecture, showcasing my adaptability and ongoing growth. My experience encompasses agile methodologies, DevOps practices, and monitoring tools like Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins, ArgoCD, Rancher, Helm, InfluxDB, Prometheus, and Grafana.

In the area of databases, I am proficient with SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I am constantly improving, studying new technologies and industry practices, and strengthening my English communication skills.
headline: Software engine | JavaScript and PHP Specialist | Experience in Front-end and Back-end | Development Full Stack | Freelancer | JS | Angular | React | Flutter | NodeJS | Java

experiences.description:
Intermediário de seguros cibernéticos entre corretoras e seguradoras; liderança da arquitetura dos
projetos em JavaScript; implementação de funcionalidades em C#, e uso NX para gerenciamento de monorepos; utilização de NestJS para o BFF, Next.js para SEO e React para o front-end; no backend, utilização de NET Core, Entity Framework (Code First), Web.API, e PostgreSQL, além de conceitos de microsserviços; toda a infraestrutura de mensageria edeploy é realizada comferramentasdaAzure.

Participating in Android/iOS projects for RD, contributing to the Drogasil and Droga Raia apps. Applying clean code, clean architecture, and SOLID principles, elevating my profile to a senior professional.

With my growth and recognition within the team, I had the opportunity to take on several projects that provided me with significant professional development. I worked on SLA, resolving bugs for the Aurora application, which uses Java Swing. In that same project, I worked on coding demands with Groovy, a language I had never worked with before, but was able to demonstrate good resilience.

As my knowledge of JavaScript increased, I took on a very important project. In the first phase, I modified the application's style, and in the next stage, I refactored the code. I conducted proof of concept tests to choose the appropriate technologies, and we decided to use NX for the monorepo, React + RxJS (to work with reactivity on the front-end), and CBOR for communication with the back-end, in order to have fast communication. The application is called Xviewer and aims to be a web viewer of X-ray exams.

In addition, to increase reliability in the applications, I placed great emphasis on unit testing and integration testing, and was able to demonstrate my work with BDD using Python.
experiences.location: R. Espírito Santo, 315 - 7° andar - Santo Antônio, São Caetano do Sul - SP, 09530-700

experiences.description: I had the opportunity to lead some projects, which gave me recognition within the team. In the LGPD project, I was responsible for the frontend using React and Styled-Components, and the backend using Java with Spring Boot. Later, I moved to WebLaudos where I could showcase my CSS skills. Finally, I led the LTA project also using React.

experiences.description: Architecture of Micro Frontends using Module Federation from Webpack in Angular projects (versions 12, 13, and 14).

When I worked at Capgemini, I had the opportunity to work for Banco do Brasil (BB), where I was involved in the early stages of the Gift Card project. During my time there, I was able to improve my knowledge of Nginx, which was used as a reverse proxy, and I also began working with React Native for iOS and Android development.

Below are some of the technologies that I worked with during my time at the company:

Development of new features using the Kumuluz and Quarkus Java frameworks, NodeJs, and React.
DevOps tools used included Kubernetes, Docker, Helm, Nginx, Jenkins, ArgoCD, and Rancher.
Monitoring tools used included InfluxDB, Prometheus, JaegerTracing, and Grafana.
Development of new features and maintenance in legacy systems, acting languages so far: Java and angular 2+

Systems development using Java Spring strains,
Angular V2 +, React JS and React Native.

experiences.description:
When I worked for this company, which aimed to be a software agency/factory resulting from the merger of two companies, Icon and Faros, I had the opportunity to work on various projects. Below is a summary of the programming languages and projects I worked on:

Development of systems using C# (SGUS), Ruby (Redimine), Angular V2+ (trilhas, atendimento), NodeJs + Ionic (Conhecigame), PHP (Conselhos, transparência, Moodle, Eleições, etc), Extjs and Sencha Architect (sistemas da CODEVASF).
